data.author: Get Me There Transit App LLC

changelog.release_notes: -Added app alerts for information about cities, notification of a new version available, announcements, etc.

-Completely redesigned user interface
-Nearby routes menu
-Trip view window
-Multiple favorites
-Timeline pins
-Many bug fixes and improvements

-Fixed a bug that caused the app to crash frequently when transit directions were 13 characters in a row, twice in a row
-Memory and battery improvements
-Bug Fixes

-Added Sliding Text for Trip Heading Overflow
-Added customization setting to determine when to show favorite card

-Short back button click now quits the app
-Minor improvements

data.description:
Get Me There is a public transit schedule app designed for commuters and frequent public transit users. Upon launch the app will display the upcoming departure times for nearby stops, with all modes of public transit supported. The app also corrects for real-time departures where data is available.

Get Me There has many unique features such as the ability to set favorite stops, add departure times to your timeline, and where available, Get Me There will display real-time departure times so you'll know exactly when your train will arrive.

Get Me There is currently available in the following cities:
Philadelphia*
New York City*
Chicago
San Francisco*
DC/Baltimore
Boston
Denver
Miami
Seattle
Portland
Dallas
Detroit
State College, PA
and more!


You're in the city shopping and going to a show and you don't know where the nearest public transit stops are? No problem, launch Get Me There and you are immediately presented with the nearest public transit stations.

You're at work, or you still have a last minute project to finish, and you want to know when the next few buses or trains are coming? No problem, launch Get Me There and you'll immediately know when the next ten buses/trains are coming so you can plan your work accordingly.  You can even see when each train will arrive at your destination.  The real-time feature will tell you exactly when your train will arrive, not just the scheduled time, so you're never left there standing in the non-air conditioned station waiting minutes on end for your late train.

latest_release.release_notes: -Added app alerts for information about cities, notification of a new version available, announcements, etc.

data.title: Get Me There
